products.title: Intellifresh 431L 2 Star Platina Frost Free Double-Door Refrigerator
products.desc: The Whirlpool Intellifresh 431L 2 Star Frost Free Double-Door Refrigerator is designed to meet the needs of large families, offering a substantial 431-liter capacity. Its 2-star energy rating ensures moderate energy efficiency, balancing performance with energy consumption.
products.warranty: Comes with a 1-year comprehensive warranty on the product and a 9-year warranty on the compressor, ensuring peace of mind and reliable service.

products.title: LG 630L, Side-by-Side Refrigerator, InstaView, Matte Black

products.warranty: The LG 630L InstaView Matte Black Refrigerator comes with a 1-year comprehensive warranty and a 10-year warranty on the Smart Inverter Compressor.

products.title: Play Station 5
products.desc: The PlayStation 5 (PS5) is Sony's latest-generation gaming console, offering cutting-edge performance, immersive gameplay, and stunning visuals. It features a custom 8-core AMD Zen 2 CPU, RDNA 2 GPU, 16GB GDDR6 RAM, and a lightning-fast SSD for near-instant load times. The PS5 supports 4K gaming, ray tracing, and up to 120 FPS for select titles, delivering lifelike graphics and fluid motion.
products.warranty: The PlayStation 5 typically comes with a one-year limited warranty covering manufacturing defects. Additional warranty or extended coverage options may be available depending on the retailer or region.

products.title: Samsung 465 L 3 Star Frost Free Double Door Refrigerator(RT47K6358SL/TL, EZ Clean Steel, Convertible)
products.desc: The Samsung 465 L 3 Star Frost Free Double Door Refrigerator (Model: RT47K6358SL/TL) is a versatile and energy-efficient appliance designed to meet the needs of medium to large-sized families.
products.warranty: The Samsung 465L refrigerator comes with a 1-year product warranty and a 10-year compressor warranty for long-term reliability.

products.title: LG 7 Kg, 5 Star, Direct Drive Technology, Steam Wash

products.warranty: The LG 7 kg washing machine offers a 2-year product warranty and a 10-year motor warranty for durability and peace of mind.

products.title: Apple TV 4K
products.desc: The Apple TV 4K is a premium streaming device that delivers exceptional audio and video quality, seamlessly integrating with Apple's ecosystem and smart home accessories.
products.warranty: The Apple TV 4K comes with a 1-year limited warranty for the product and up to 90 days of complimentary technical support. Additionally, you can purchase the AppleCare+ plan for extended coverage, which provides up to 3 years of service, including accidental damage coverage.

products.title: Prestige Popular Virgin Aluminium Precision Weight Valve Outer Lid Pressure Cooker, 5 L
products.desc: Crafted for modern kitchens, the Prestige Popular Outer Lid Pressure Cooker offers the perfect blend of durability, efficiency, and safety. Made from high-grade virgin aluminum, this cooker ensures long-lasting performance and even heat distribution for faster cooking.
products.warranty: The Prestige Popular Pressure Cooker comes with a 5-year warranty, ensuring reliable performance and peace of mind. It covers manufacturing defects and provides long-term support.

X-Box
products.desc: The Xbox Series X and Series S are Microsoft’s latest-generation gaming consoles, delivering powerful performance and immersive gaming experiences. The Xbox Series X is the flagship model, featuring a custom 8-core AMD Zen 2 CPU, RDNA 2 GPU capable of up to 12 teraflops, 16GB GDDR6 RAM, and a 1TB SSD. It supports 4K gaming at up to 120 FPS, ray tracing, and quick load times with its Velocity Architecture.
products.warranty: Xbox consoles, including the Series X and Series S, typically come with a one-year limited warranty (or longer, depending on the region). This warranty covers manufacturing defects and hardware failures, but it does not include accidental damage or issues caused by misuse.
